name: Call Of Crab
description:
Discover Call Of Crab an “old school” FPS in a world made of paper !

Story :
The gorgeous “Canson” island is under attack ! An evil army of crabs have invaded the
island !
It’s your job to get rid of them in this world made of paper ! But be careful to not get ripped !

Controls :
Use the arrow keys to move around and press SPACE to attack with your cutter.
Once you have ammo, you’ll be able to shoot ! Use SPACE for shooting and hold it to
charge your attacks!

Tools :
Made with Unity 2019.3.4f, Maya, Photoshop, Substance painter.

Context :
Student project of 2 months for ESA GAMES school.
“Make an old school FPS game, with 2D enemies in a 3D environment.
The game must have one action button”.

Credits :
